lsdl.config.dogsSpawnLying: Do dogs spawn into the world lying down if they are already sitting.
lsdl.config.timeBeforeLie: Time to spend sitting (in ticks) before dogs lie down.
lsdl.config.rangeBeforeGettingUp:
Range for target to get to dog before dog gets up (in blocks)
lsdl.config.getsUpTo=Who the dog gets up to. 0 = Nobody, 1 = Owner, 2 = Players, 3 = Any living entity
lsdl.config.enabledPoses: Poses for lying down that are enabled. If the mod can't find compatible poses, it will randomly pick one set.
lsdl.config.attemptModWolfSupport: Allow the mod to attempt to add support for mod wolves? (Still doesn't allow support for Doggy Talents)
